Name: Urban Legend: Train to Who-Knows-Where
Description: Out in the wild, an urban legend takes shape. A Midnight Train, said to be packed with "ghosts," races endlessly through the night, toward who knows where... Is it truly as Mayo claimed? Gather your courage and go take a look!
QuestDesc: Out in the wild, an urban legend takes shape. A Midnight Train, said to be packed with "ghosts," races endlessly through the night, toward who knows where... Is it truly as Mayo claimed? Gather your courage and go take a look!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The midnight air smells of rust and the damp. Far down the tracks, something flickers. An eerie, pale blue glow pulses in the dark.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mayo, I think I just saw that "Midnight Train."

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, how's it going over there? ...Can you hear me?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm going after it—!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, what!? Hey! Hello!? Your signal's... cutting... Don't do anything reckless! You hear me—?!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This rift… Is it because of the Voidmatter? Or something else?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Either way, I'll clear it out first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: —{PlayerName}? Are you okay!? Can you hear me? You lost signal just now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh dear, no response at all... If something happened to {Male=him;Female=her}… I-I should've called backup...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm, ah! You… you scared me half to death!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you did see that train, right? Closer and clearer than I ever did.

Options.PlotLineKey: Yeah. And I took a picture for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You send Mayo the photo and recount everything that happened while the comms were down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So the train was shuttling between that monster-spawning rift… and our world?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But why? Why that train? Who's operating it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll need to raise its classification level and investigation priority. We'll need deeper research and thorough verification for a conclusion.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe it isn't ferrying departed souls. Maybe it's carrying something else… to a "gate" elsewhere.

Options.PlotLineKey: (She's surprisingly serious when it comes to this stuff…)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A chilled, night breeze blows, and far down the tracks, that faint blue glow flickers. You suddenly realize the train might still be continuing its journey.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Helloooo! {PlayerName}, can you hear me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? You're breaking up. Anyway, forget it. Call me again once you're near the station. Maybe the connection will be better there!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You contact Mayo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …{PlayerName}? Ahh, there we go! Signal's clear now!

Options.PlotLineKey: Mayo, do you know what time it is?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh... pushing midnight? Why? What's up?

Options.PlotLineKey: Most people don't make calls at this hour.
Most people would be asleep by now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But you're not "most people," are you? Besides! Midnight is when the spiritual energy is at its strongest! It's prime time for the paranormal! Half the best urban legends begin at this exact hour!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Midnight chills, heartbeat thrills… Hmm? Did I just hear wind and the screech of metal on your end?

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm on the field, near the tracks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perfect! Right time, right place! Ta-dah, time for a super authentic urban legend investigation!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ever heard of the "Midnight Train That Never Stops and Heads to Who-Knows-Where"?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right at the stroke of twelve, it glides silently into the station, cabins full of "ghosts." If you board it, you might be carried straight into the underworld...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Or so they say, because no living passenger has ever come back to tell the tale.

Options.PlotLineKey: Which master storyteller came up with this one?
Or is it just that no one's tried boarding it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nope! This urban legend is different. It's real. Absolutely, totally legit... I've seen it with my own eyes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was investigating another case when I stumbled across it... The fog was so thick, but through it, I saw this pale, blue light. It was like the train was calling to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And then? Well, I only saw it from afar! It pulled out before I could get any closer!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was this close! It's been haunting me ever since... Which is why, {PlayerName}, you...

Options.PlotLineKey: Don't tell me you want me to investigate it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mm-hmm! Since you're asking, I'll take that as a yes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry! As leader of the Paranormal Fan Club, I'll be there to give you remote support the entire time!

Options.PlotLineKey: You're just obsessed with this, aren't you?
...Well, it's kinda nice that you care to do that for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, you know, that's kind of what our club is about, and our guiding purpose, after all!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come on, I'll guide you to the exact spot! Oh, and if anything shocking happens, take a picture! I need material for recruiting new members!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mayo, hello? Did the line cut? Where is this place?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Guess this counts as something shocking. I should snap a picture for her.
